EmailTemplate.description: Contract Management Enquiry (CME) Case Comments Updated
EmailTemplate.name: CME Case Comments Updated v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject} - Case Comments Updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Colleague,
Your case is ‘Awaiting Information’
In order to action your request can you please provide further information as detailed in the Case Comments Field.
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Case Comments:
{!Case.Last_Case_Comment}
Please do not respond to this request via reply e-mail. Add information/comments and relevant attachments to your case online by following the link below.
{!Case.Link} or entering your case number into the search engine on the front page of SalesForce.com.
Please Note:
• If no response is received within 7 days of this request a reminder notification will be sent.
• The case will be closed after 3 days if no response is received to the reminder notification.
Alternatively, you can contact the Sales Support team on 1800SalesSupport@auspost.com.au or 1800 316 508 during business hours.
Regards
Contract Management Team
